likedText:
It's been a fantastic experience! Lovely people, very friendly. They all try hard to provide the best. They left a handwritten message in the bedroom wishing us a nice stay, a welcome treat with local foods and drink, a room tour explaining all smart technology incorporated (the blinds are my favorite).
Everything is immaculate and very neat which is a must have for me.
The shower feels like a spa, very comfortable couch and bed, the hotel is soundproofed so a good sleep is guaranteed, you can find nice wooden hangers, augmentation mirror, good quality hairdryer, robes, slippers... The bedroom had everything you could need and beyond. Very modern and new. The breakfast service is extraordinary as well. A wide range of variety of local products and of course, kind service.
Location is just perfect. Surrounded by many restaurants, shops, very short walking distance of historical sites and safe.
Can't wait to come back!

The location is amazing. Right in the center of everything. The staff was so nice and they really helped with everything. 
They have an app to control the room and it’s really easy to use
Breakfast was good, location was excellent.

dislikedText:
Getting to the hotel was somewhat challenging due to the narrow pedestrian leading to the entrance, with busy traffic. While the IoT lighting added a high-tech touch, it was inconvenient to use; the unlabelled physical buttons were hard to figure out, having to open a mobile app to turn on the lights felt cumbersome.

The most disappointment was the coffee machine, which was poorly maintained, with significant limescale buildup in the water tank.  I had to wash it and clean it up before use.  However, the Nespresso capsule wouldn’t stay in place, often dropping to the bottom of the machine instead.

reviewTitle: Great central location.  Very clean and modern
dislikedText:
We checked-in in a hurry and had to rush out for dinner. We didn’t have time to familiarise ourselves with the smart controls. This meant a sleepless night because I couldn’t sleep and get the air conditioning to work. I couldn’t even open the curtains in the morning!  So, smart controls OK if you have time or are familiar with them but they didn’t  make our stay any easier or better. In fact, they had a negative impact.

Our bedroom also faced on to a busy road, so it was quite noisy at night. That combined with no air conditioning made for no sleep.

On the day of check-out we had a late flight and left our luggage with reception so we could do some sightseeing starting early in the morning (Acropolis tour before the heat).  The hotel kindly arranged our transfer, so we returned to the hotel to collect our luggage and get picked up for the transfer. Hotel charged us for coffees while we were waiting, which I thought was poor because this was a premium hotel.

likedText:
After our one-night stay at Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel, we returned for an additional three nights, and overall, it was another great experience. We love the location of this newly renovated hotel, which is close to most tourist sites in Old Athens, as well as souvenir shops, restaurants, and nightlife. It's also just a one-minute walk to the main metro station in Monastiraki and a nearby bus station.

The second thing we loved most was the friendliness of the staff. We cannot forget the black curly-haired lady at reception and her warm smile every time we passed by (unfortunately, we don't recall her name). She was very friendly, supportive, and even seemed sad when we mentioned we were heading back home.
reviewTitle: A Perfect Spot in Athens with Warm Hospitality
dislikedText: There are two areas where the hotel might consider improvements: 1) offering more variety in the breakfast options, and 2) providing electrical or c cable plugs closer to the bed, as it wasn't convenient to recharge our phones from afar. P.S. We managed with the Smart lighting and air conditioning system, but it could be a bit complicated at times.
propertyResponse:

likedText:
The area around - Hotel is in the centre of everything. So you are able to walk to historical sites, best restaurants are nearby and everything you would like to visit or taste is close to the hotel. Even subway is about 4min out. 

Staff have been extremely helpful and careful. There are lots of young people and they are ready to help you with anything you need or want. Nothing is problem for them. I would recommend this hotel for everyone. 

Rooms are also soundproof and quiet even that hotel is in real centre. 

Breakfast was classic - warm or cold like in every good hotel, no problem at all with it. I think everyone find a great option what to get for breakfast. Really good coffee and fresh orange juice.
reviewTitle: Great stay, close to everything you want, great staff, great breakfast and better to find place for dinner somewhere els
dislikedText: One thing that is in my mind was dinner. We have half board and for dinner I expect some greek specialties but there are less greek options than classic meal like spaghetti with seafood (nothing special), burger (only patty with french fries and classic mustard). Great was greek salad and quinoa salad. Overall there are better options all around so no need to take dinner in hotel kitchen. Meals are good, but typical Greek cuisine better find somewhere else. Although there is less options for dinner (2 salads, 2 warm appetizers, 3 main courses and 2 desserts). Problem was, that no matter what time you come for dinner, there is some meal they don’t have. In the end you could choose from 2 salads, 1 warm appetizer, 2 main meals and 1 dessert from thin selection.

likedText:
The single room is a perfect comfortable stay for 1 person. The guy who works on the night shift at the reception went out of his way to make sure I have comfortable stay. He helped wake me up by knocking at the door [as requested by me] because I cannot hear the morning call as a very deep sleeper. He also prepared the breakfast box for me despite the last minute request as I need to catch the boat to Santorini before breakfast. He even helped walk me to the station to make sure I get to the right place and not miss the boat. Without him, I woild have missed the boat for sure ! 

For those travelling first time to Greece and do islands hopping, make sure to prepare extra time because it would take longer than you expect to travel by train + board the boat ! I left hotel around 6:55 and my boat left at 8am. Almost didn't make it !

Location was excellent too - walking distance to the Acropolis and train station, plus all local attractions. In short, this hotel is modern, well located and run by an amazingly dedicated team, who were always happy to assist by going above and beyond. Highly recommended.

likedText: The location is outstanding for experiencing Athens, around the corner from Monastiraki Square, the metro, many restaurants and shops/markets galore.  We walked everywhere from the Acropolis (15 min), museum row east of Syntagma Square (20 min), through the Plaka neighborhood (10-15 min) and up to the National Archaeological Museum (25 min). The room itself was a good size, well-equipped, clean and very comfortable. We found the staff to be very friendly and helpful, assisting with explanations and information to help us get around and take advantage of Athens. And then breakfast was wonderful, a buffet with many options including dishes that changed daily. A great place and we'll be happy to stay there again.
dislikedText: Some of the "modern" design elements miss the mark in terms of convenience/practicality.  Little annoyances.  Except that the room doorknob is mounted flush with the edge of the door and door frame. Meaning that if you wrap your hands on the knob and push in your fingers are crushed between the knob and the door frame. Skinned a knuckle on that one.

Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel

likedText: It's a straightforward hotel, with smart controls via phone app. Breakfast was pretty good. The proximity to food and the top tourist spots was really nice too!
dislikedText:
Having the ability to open my door by clicking a button on my phone was very strange. I got used to it of course, but it took a day or so. 

Also, watch out for the doorknob. I pinched my hand between the door jamb and the knob, because the tolerances are too tight. Not a deal breaker, just something to keep an eye on.

likedText: The location is close to everything! Metro 3M from the airport to Monastiraki square is so convenient. reviewTitle: We definitely want to come back!

The app didn’t make the connection so well to have the lights, airco and blinds operating, but you can also use the regular switches in your room. 
The shower drain was not running and therefor the shower was flooding. We had to remove the steel drain-cover each day and that solved it. This seems more a shower floor construction issue than a cleaning issue.

We found the concept of a "smart" hotel interesting and fun. The app had some bugs here and there, but nothing particularly inconvenient. We enjoyed playing with all the features.
Otherwise, the room was very clean, the beds were very comfy, the staff was friendly, nothing that we would not expect from a 5-star. The breakfast was very well stocked, with many local products, great bread and pastries and delicious desserts (that looked pretty much home made).
The location can't really get more central than this, close to the subway and within walking distance of shops, restaurants and monuments.
dislikedText: The room was rather on the small side and the windows were facing a wall, but honestly for our short stay neither of these was a problem.

likedText:
We had an awesome time at Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel! The hotel is very modern with cool tech features. One of the best parts was our room's view of the Acropolis, and we really enjoyed the lovely balcony. Being in the center of the city, we could walk to many places easily.

The staff were super friendly and always ready to help. Plus, the food was tasty!

If you're looking for a cozy place with great views and easy access to the city, this hotel is perfect. Big thanks to the team for making our stay special!
reviewTitle: Modern comfort and stunning Acropolis views at Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel
dislikedText: None.

likedText: The room was very comfortable and the location was fantastic.
dislikedText: The room had no view and the curtains didn’t fully black out the room. The tap on the sink is to long and when you wash your hands it splashes water all over the bathroom.

likedText: Staff was super friendly.  The room and especially bathroom exceeded expectations. The shower was amazing! Perfect walking distance to everything we wanted to do and lots of places to eat right there.
First up, staff were exceptional in every way - couldn’t be faulted. Add to that a superb room, in a very central location and it’s a 10 out of 10
reviewTitle: We would absolutely recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to stay central Athens. Extremely helpful and professional st

likedText: Great location. Great soundproofing between rooms and hall. Great staff. Tech in rooms is fantastic, including the ability to cast to TV from mobile devices. Probably the best shower I've ever used (they use Grohe Grohtherm smart thermostatic controls).
reviewTitle: Nice Athens hotel in a great location
dislikedText: Air conditioning didn't cool very well. Room seemed to be capped at 23C despite setting on wall thermostat and room control app.

likedText: Location was great, staff were friendly and helpful, breakfast was good, room was lovely. Over all - great hotel. 🙂
reviewTitle: If going to Athens, would definitely recommend.
dislikedText: Nothing we didnt like.

likedText: Very pretty hotel. It's considered a smart hotel because you can control all of the lights blinds AC etc. using the app. However as with any technology if the connection is weak sometimes it is not as responsive taking up to 30 seconds to a minute to respond. Breakfast was included and very delicious with the wind brand of pastries egg dishes and teas coffee's and juices. Everyone was very helpful especially Theo and Demetris in reception, and chara, Evina, Charis in the restaurant. Reception was very helpful with good recommendations for food and helpful with arranging taxi services. They were even kind enough to give us a later check out time, without charge, due to flight cancellations. Centrally located in Psiri and in close proximity to various bars, food places, and the Monsaraki square
dislikedText: Considered "smart hotel " because you are supposed to be able to control room lights , entry , fans etc from an app that was either unresponsive or didn't work altogether....

likedText:
Location was amazing. Walkable to lots of great restaurants and all the tourist sites. Great energy, neighborhood.

Rooms were spacious and clean. We had an amazing view of the Acropolis from one of our rooms and enjoyed the deck at night with the view.

Front desk was friendly and helpful and housekeeping services met expectations.
reviewTitle: Amazing location with new, clean, comfortable sized rooms. Gorgeous views available from some rooms!
dislikedText:
Breakfast choices were good. Unfortunately, we did not learn until our second day that there was a menu we could order from in addition to the buffet items.

Also, we would have enjoyed access to a gym as it was much to hot in Athens to exercise outside.

likedText: Everything was wonderful. Staff, room, cleanliness and location.

Superb location, walk to key attractions and restaurants. Awesome breakfast with Greek delicacies. Friendly staff. 
A little too high tech, but that's a minor gripe
dislikedText: Nothing really. But the location is a little harder for taxis to reach.

likedText: from the minute you enter you feel right at home. theo was very helpful. rooms were clean and modern decoration. breakfast - you can order benedict/strapsada made like chef level. and the location - spot on! right near monastraki square
dislikedText: nothing really

likedText: The location of the hotel is right in the heart of Athens. Walking distance to everything. The staff at the hotel were friendly, helpful and always followed through on requests. Rooms were spacious and comfortable.
reviewTitle: Great location, good value for money and attentive, helpful staff.
dislikedText: The hotel promotes that it is a smart hotel but the technology was not working for a lot of the time we stayed - which was 4 days. The breakfast room feels a little stark - they could review how to warm this up given it does not have any windows.

likedText: Great location, beautiful room, amazing shower, very good breakfast, very helpful and friendly staff.
reviewTitle: Great location, beautiful room, amazing shower, very good breakfast, very helpful and friendly staff.
dislikedText: It was perfect

likedText: I recently stayed at Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel and had a wonderful experience. The rooms were equipped with smart automation technology that made my stay more convenient and comfortable. The staff was extremely polite and friendly, always willing to help with any request I had. The hotel had a modern and elegant design that added to the overall experience. I had a great night's sleep thanks to the comfortable bed and quiet atmosphere. The hotel is conveniently located near many restaurants and shops, making it an ideal location for both business and leisure travelers. Overall, I highly recommend the Hellenic Vibes for those looking for a comfortable, convenient, and modern stay, with excellent service from the staff. Thank you, Christina!!!
Highly recommended. Very helpful staff and good location.
reviewTitle: Would stay there for my next time.

likedText:
Breakfast was great, good selection of hot and cold food, staff were very pleasant and helpful.
Location was excellent, close to all shops and transport. Staff at the front desk welcomed us on every entry and exit and were always happy to assist.
reviewTitle: Very nice accommodation, in a great location with excellent staff.
dislikedText: I would only be nit picking to find something. the overall experience was excellent, very happy to recommend this hotel.

likedText: Location, excellent service, helpful staff, room facilities outstanding.  Breakfast v good
dislikedText: Nothing

likedText:
Super comfortable rooms. We had 2 rooms, one with view to Acropolis, and the other a single for  daughter. Both rooms spacious, very clean, comfortable, and all mod cons, with very helpful staff. I have stayed in many hotels, and don't believe I have come across more helpful staff.
Breakfast great, but ate out in the evenings, with plenty of options nearby.
Air conditioning great, which given it was over 40 degrees while we were there was essential.
Location convenient to all main sites...15 mins walk to Acropolis.
Would definitely come back.
dislikedText:
Hot tub on balcony would have been great 😀

Only possible downside is buildings opposite are a bit run-down/being developed? which for some might create a negative perception - but not an issue.

likedText: Really enjoyed every part of staying in this hotel - staff were friendly, location was great, breakfast had lots of tasty options and the room was comfortable and a great escape from the hot sun. Smart features were an added bonus.
reviewTitle: Friendly, comfortable, relaxing and would definitely come back and recommend to friends.
dislikedText: There were no particular aspects we didn't like - the only thing was our room door needed to be pulled a bit hard to make sure it locked once locked then no issues - this was the only negative and it didn't impact our stay. The hotel was very safe.

likedText: The hotel is very clean, the location is great. Breakfast was very good as well. All the staff were super friendly and helpful (special thanks to Kristina, Christos, Katerina) and the staff in the restaurant. :)
reviewTitle: Amazing stay, great location, very clean hotel
dislikedText: Unfortunately there was a problem with the AC in the rooms (I suppose due to the heat wave) and the room was warm. However, the management offered a small refund to us which was appreciated. We will visit again for sure though because everything else was simply great.

likedText: Location is outstanding. Walking distance to everywhere in Athens centre.
dislikedText: Nothing. It doesn’t have a pool but that was obvious when I booked it.

likedText: Excellent hotel. Smart & business-like. Good sized rooms with fantastic shower room etc. Great location, couple of minutes walk from monastiraki station, far enough away from the noise.

likedText: The hotel was very well located to Metro, shopping, and the city center near the Acropolis. Everything was clean, bright, and well insulated from the heat and sounds.
reviewTitle: Great hotel if you ignore the techie aspect of it.
dislikedText: The "smart" aspect of the hotel was very frustrating. Requiring an app in order to use the lights, AC, and door lock was not implemented well, even though the concept is neat. The app needed to be restarted before every use, and even then it wouldn't always work. Sometimes the AC would just stop working in the middle of the night. None of the button controls on the walls were not labeled, so you have to press everything to figure out what does what.

likedText: I love the ‘smart’ concept. I’m surprised more properties have not adopted this concept. The hotel is clean, modern, crisp and rooms are exceptionally well designed and maintained. Staff are efficient, helpful and friendly. For me, the location was great. Right in the central core, just a block from Monastaraki Square, great restaurants and shopping. The Plaka, Acropolis and major historical sites are all walkable. Don’t be turned off by the not attractive side street the entrance is on. Turn at either end of the block and you’re in another vibrant scene.
reviewTitle: You’d Be ‘Smart’ to Book This One
dislikedText: No issues.

Hotel is a 2-min walk to the metro, 2-mins to the main shopping district and 15-mins walk to Acropolis. So many local restaurant choices nearby you’ll go crazy choosing one.

likedText: the reception staff were remarkable-super proffessional and hospitable.  the receptionist assisted us in renting a car last minute and wemt out of his way to find us the best deal! the rooms are super modern and the shower too.  breakfast team were super sweet and kind.    location=superb.

Everything they tell you about the breakfast and the showers is TRUE! The shower is a dream, and so is the breakfast. The room is very comfortable and very modern - there is a nespresso machine and everything is automated, even the curtains. The location is smack-right in the middle of the shopping area, with loads of bars and restaurants near, and not too far from the famous sights. The staff was super kind too. I was very happy to find the restaurant was open until 10 pm as I arrived quite late from the ferry. Worth every penny, would stay again.
dislikedText: Hardly anything to mention - I couldn't figure out the air conditioning system (probably too hyper modern for my understanding) so the room was a little hot at night.

likedText: Everything

The location is amazing - you can walk to everything so easily (even the National Museum)! But the real highlight of this hotel is the staff! They go out of their way to be welcoming and helpful. I would stay here again just for the staff/location even though I didn’t much like the actual room.
reviewTitle: Amazing location and perfect staff, but rooms are a little odd. Still worth staying here.
dislikedText: Our room was a little run down. The doorknob seemed like it might fall off and there were several scrapes and nicks on the fixtures and walls. The app that controls the room is annoying - you have to log in each time (it doesn’t remember your phone) and the controls are glitchy - bathroom lights often turned off on their own even while you were in there! At night, so much light still came in through the sides of the blinds so it was not dark at all until the stores below turned out their lights. The shower drain was slow and the shower head was mounted so high on the ceiling that it cannot be cleaned, so it sprayed water out everywhere at odd angles. It seems like whoever designed and/or built this hotel took some shortcuts and used poor quality materials, apparently the hotel is only 1 year old but at least the room we stayed in appeared already worn out.

likedText: Breakfast offerings were excellent. Location was close to everything.
reviewTitle: Heavenly Suite at Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel

likedText: It was interesting controlling the room's ambience using my Smartphone. The location of the property is excellent since it is close to Monastiraki square. Breakfast was exceptional and the bathroom fixtures were practically new.
dislikedText: When we entered the room, the AC was on heat mode at 30 degrees Celsius! The receptionist changed the mode quickly but it took about an hour until the room's temperature was adequate. The USB charging ports next to the bed was not working.

Dear Ran, thank you for sharing your honest feedback and we appreciate your generous rating and remarks regarding your experience with us. We apologize for not meeting up your expectations during your stay, unfortunately, due to a technical issue on one of the days of your stay. We do believe that from the moment that we did experience a temporary issue with hot water (warm water was efficient of course) on the specific day, our teams did their utmost to solve it and technical department was involved. Since it was not solved as soon as expected we did proceed immediately to a refund of that day and after you agreed you asked for an additional refund for the breakfast that you would miss due to earlier check out. We usually receive excellent reviews regarding our facilities, our services and teams since our recent opening and we love to provide outstanding service to all our guests. We appreciate your gesture to share your opinion in public and would be happy to host you again on another occasion in the heart of Athens.

likedText:
Booked the queen suite for my 10 year anniversary with my partner and was blown away with the hotel, staff and location. We had a bottle of wine and platter of fresh fruit on arrival which was delicious. 

The hotel and reception was fast, fantastic and modern style all round.
The room was amazing, comfortable, huge, clean, kitted out and the smart features made it incredible user friendly and fun! The hot tub bath, large shower and huge balcony were amazing features of the room providing real luxury. 
The location of the hotel was incredibly central but tucked just far away off the main street to provide a quiet setting. 
The staff were incredibly useful, attentive providing support advice and an overall amazing atmosphere. 

We got the breakfast included and just wow! Amazing food, variety and locally sourced goods. Everything was of great quality from the food down to the cast iron teapots the hot drinks were served in making for a great and quality experience.

This hotel was an overall fantastic place to stay and having travelled nearly all of the European capitals staying in plenty of hotels I can confidently say it was one of the best base locations to see a city I have ever experienced at a completely reasonable rate.

Id recommend this to everyone coming to Athens!
reviewTitle: An amazing romantic weekend away in Athens.

likedText:
Everything was great.
The staff was helpful and friendly.
The location was close enough that everything was at a walking distance.

the hair dryer.
the TV.
the location.
the welcoming drinks and snacks in the room.
dislikedText:
many things in the room were not working!
the smart system is not up to par, the room literally unlocked itself a few times, we constantly had to check it was locked before we slept.
the bathroom shower and sink were constantly clogging and over flowing onto the floor and into the room, when they sent someone to fix it i asked if she could come back in half an hour and she said no the front desk will call you to arrange another time (they never did).
the wifi would not connect to my devices (missed an important interview because of it) and when i called the staff to ask about the wifi he told me to try and connect to an unsecured network from any other property close by. every time i called the front desk for assistance i was met with resistance on a number of occasions. 
the towels literally felt like sand paper!
to top it all off the blinds were removed from our room without prior knowledge and were not reinstalled (we slept without them).
the safe was locked and during our entire stay even after i spoke to front desk several times about unlocking it for us, they never did.
would never stay here again and would not even recommend it, its a 5 star hotel and i have stayed in 4 star hotels that were more accommodating than this one.

likedText: location! could walk to Acropolis in minutes. Hop on/off bus stop 2 min walk, dozens of restaurants, metro to airport 3 min walk. breakfast was fabulous, Greek coffee was delicious. Front desk staff helpful with recommendations for activities/transport/food.

likedText: Everything and everyone was very nice and so tasty a beautiful place in the perfect center of the city!

The front desk staff Yianni and Lambro were warm, friendly and accommodating to our  requests and any questions we had, from the minute we met them to the end of our stay. Thank you to both gentlemen! They are excellent at their job and were both  always happy to see us and greeted us on every occasion that we entered or left the hotel during our two day stay. The entrance to the hotel is slightly set back from the street and although it’s in the heart of the city, this made it quiet during the night, making for a comfortable and restful night’s sleep. The shower facilities and massaging shower head were the best we’d tried out of all the hotels we’d stayed in up to that point. My wife is super clean and was so happy and impressed with the cleanliness of our room, the breakfast dining room and hotel in general. We would definitely stay here again in the future.

likedText:
If you want to stay in the historic center of Athens two things are of primary importance: location and noise level. This hotel fulfills on both counts.
The Hellenic Vibes is a modern, state of the art, hotel with friendly and knowledgeable staff. A tranquil oasis amid the city bustle.
Our room was the right size and comfortable.
Also to be noted: a very nice breakfast buffet that caters to all sorts of tastes.
reviewTitle: The positives outweigh the minor inconveniences. This is a hotel we would return to and recommend.
dislikedText: There are minor wrinkles that still need to be ironed out: not enough closet space, towel racks in the bathroom. The app that lets you run your room takes a bit getting used to. The staff said that improvements were still being worked on and encouraged us to give them feedback.

likedText: This is a great boutique hotel in an excellent location only 15 min from the Acropolis.  Despite being right near the action, the windows were completely soundproof which was great.  Everything was brand new and the beds were extremely comfortable.  It was a large room, super comfortable for me with my two kids.  The staff went out of their way to create a pleasant stay for us and the breakfast was excellent.
reviewTitle: Overall it was great.  I'd stay there again.
dislikedText: This is a 4, not 5 star hotel.  Not sure how they decided it was 5 stars, but it isn't (at least yet - it could be in the future. with some modifications).  For example, no one offered to help us take our luggage to our room (something you typically get even at 4 star hotels), the maid service left used glasses and didn't provide new ones, they don't have a gym, no room service after 4pm, etc.  These didn't impact our stay so weren't a big deal, but I do think it's misleading to say this is a 5 star hotel despite the rooms and beds being wonderful.

Perfectly situated in the Μοναστηράκι area and minutes from the metro station. There's a huge variety of places to eat, drink and shop and all the famous tourist landmarks are within walking distance. 

Staff were very friendly and super-responsive to the couple of (small) issues I had. 

Innovative approach with the use of an app to control lighting, a/c etc. in the room. I was a bit dubious at first but by the end of my stay I was converted.

My room was a single but actually was pretty large and had a very comfy double bed. 

Housekeeping was very good.
reviewTitle: Modern hotel in the heart of Μοναστηράκι
dislikedText:
Positioning of the bed was such that one of the reading lights couldn't be switched on which was a bit odd. I think the bed may have been positioned to allow access from both sides.  

The automated blind wasn't flush against the window so that the exterior light (in the window frame) which came on at dusk leaked in. Wasn't a huge problem to be honest but not sure the exterior light is needed.   

I liked the app but the passcode wasn't long enough to be secure.  As the app could be used to unlock one's room I think the hotel should look at improving its security. 

Individual toiletries instead of refillable dispensers were used which seem less sustainable to me. 

Generally very quiet at night although the couple in the neighbouring room doing the nasty kept me awake on my last night. To be fair I don't think any level of soundproofing would have been up to the job.

likedText: Everything about this hotel is amazing, the location, the food, the smart rooms. It's at the center of Athens, everything is within reach. It so easy to control the blinds, lights and unlocking your door from your mobile phone. The ladies at the reception Irini and Daria are so helpful with everything, from organizing tours and answering all your questions. Loannis is well experienced, polite and a great conversationalist, ready to assist you with any questions. Their food is so rich and delicious, I had the best pancake. Giannis and Maggie at the kitchen are warm and friendly, they made me breakfast to go when I couldn't eat at the restaurant because I had a tour early in the morning. I can't wait to stay here again when next I am in Greece.

likedText: This hotel exceeded all our expectations. Everything is new and clean. Staff was exceptionally friendly and considered it a personal mission to make us feel at home, with great tips what sights to see. The queen's room was luxurious and equipped with everything we needed, beds felt like a dream and the bathroom was perfect with a heavenly shower. The location is perfect with all main attractions within walking distance. Breakfast was delicious, fresh, and made to the wishes of each guest. If we ever visit Athens again I will be sure to book the Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel again.
reviewTitle: Wonderfull hotel, the best staff, and a great location.
dislikedText: We did not have a single complaint.
propertyResponse:
Dear Roy Sampers, thank you for probably the best feedback we have ever received since our recent opening. Your gracious comments on the level of service are sincerely appreciated! Your kind gesture to send us treats from your country left us speechless! Thank you again for taking the time to write such an outstanding review of your stay. 
We do hope to welcome you back again very soon as promised and share greater vibes in the heart of Athens!

Always at your disposal,

Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel Team

likedText: The rooms were clean and staff friendly. The location couldn’t be better.
dislikedText:
The worst thing is the “smart” concept. Remote controlling your room is an annoying task. You can’t put your phone away and it always has to be charged. Furthermore, the app always needs to
be refreshed when you haven’t used it for an hour or so. 

However, on my last day the app didn’t work anymore. The only lights that I could turn on manually were the bathroom lights. For (un)locking the room they gave me a plastic card. That card also turned on all lights in their brightest modus, because that card is apparently for the cleaning lady. In order to sleep, I had to remove that card and seek my way to the bed in a completely dark room. 
In my opinion not acceptable for a 5 star rated hotel.
propertyResponse:
Dear Sebastian, thank you for your generous rating and polite comments regarding your recent stay and our teams. Regarding your remarks and details about the concept of the hotel we value your opinion and we always take our guests feedbacks seriously. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience and any advice is welcome to improve our services.

Hope we can host you again in the near future in Athens!

Always at your disposal,
Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel Team

likedText: Hellenic Vibes is exceptional! The location is perfect, right in the historic heart of Athens, with caffes and restaurants all around. Metro station, taxis, pedestrian and shopping area at 2 mins walk. Our large room was perfectly soundproofed, with big and comfy bed, with opening windows, bathroom included!! The staff is amazing, super helpful and cater to your every need. A truly beautiful small pearl with beautiful people — highly recommended.
propertyResponse:

Always at your disposal,
Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel Team

likedText: Tres bon petit déjeuner Surclassement
reviewTitle: Tout de même bon rapport qualité prix ...
dislikedText:
Nous avons pris cet hotel deux fois
La premier fois arrivé à 14 heures au lieu de 13heures, on nous adit que notre chambre n etait pas prêt
La deuxième fois, malgré le fait qu on ait dit que nous etions fatigué, il fallait a tout prix que nous liberions la chambre à 11h00 car des clients arrivaient à midi
Enfin, la première fois, les informations pour aller à tel ou tel endroit pour nous reataurer etaient imprécises quant aux adresses
propertyResponse:
Dear Bruno, we appreciate taking the time to share your experiences with us. Thank you for the compliments regarding our breakfast .We regret your disappointment for being unable to check in upon your early arrival and understand reading your review that apparently you were not properly informed about the appointed check in time starting at 15:00 although it should be reported on the booking confirmation; at the hotel we always do our utmost to make sure our guests can check in as soon as they arrive, unfortunately during periods of high occupancy it may not be possible considering that check out is at 11:00 and our housekeeping team needs to undertake a thorough cleaning of the rooms  before assigning them to new arrivals. However, we always offer the possibility for our guests with late flights to be able to use the hotel’s facilities and freshen up before departing for the airport. Once more we thank you for choosing our hotel for your holiday and very much look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again in the future.
Best Regards, Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel Team

likedText: La situación del Hotel es excelente. Enclavado en la zona más animada de Atenas, con infinidad de restaurantes y bares de copas. A 10 minutos andando de la Acrópolis. A 2 minutos de la parada de metro Monastiraki,
dislikedText: Algo impersonal. Desayuno correcto sin más. Al contrario que en la mayoría de restaurantes en que estuvimos, nadie hablaba nada de español.

likedText:
Das Frühstücksbuffet war sehr gut, es gab jeden Tag andere griechische Spezialitäten z.B. Strapatsada. Das Frühstück war so variantenreich, dass wir gar nicht alles probieren konnten.
Das Personal hat uns jeden Wunsch erfüllt und war sehr nett und aufmerksam. 
Die Lage des Hotels ist zentral - um die Ecke liegt der Monasteraki Platz, das Psyri Viertel und unzählige Rooftop Bars.
Das Hotel ist ziemlich neu und sehr gut und komfortabel ausgestattet und trotz der zentralen Lage erstaunlich ruhig bei Nacht. Wir haben in sehr bequemen Boxspring-Betten wunderbar geschlafen.
Am Bett ein großer moderner Fernseher mit deutschem Programm.
reviewTitle: Schönes und sehr gut ausgestattetes Hotel in fantastischer Lage

likedText:
Tout d'abord l'emplacement, idéal pour découvrir tous les sites antiques de la ville.
Le contraste entre le brouhaha de la place Monastiraki et le calme retrouvé une fois franchies les portes de l'hôtel. 
Ensuit, la chambre, moderne et bien équipée, la qualité des matériaux et de la literie.
Le petit déjeuner très varié, produits frais et locaux. Commandez votre omelette à la carte, un délice ! Personnel très attentif.
Enfin, le duo de la réception, adorable, toujours souriant et de bons conseils si vous les sollicitez. Un grand merci de votre accueil à toutes et tous.

likedText:
A Localização é excelente! Andámos sempre a pé.
Os funcionários são todos simpáticos e atenciosos,  tanto da recepção como da sala de refeições.
Os quartos são grandes e espaçosos. 
A casa de banho é gira e super prática. 
O quarto onde fiquei não tinha vista para lado nenhum, mas também não fui para ficar no quarto.
O pequeno almoço não é nenhuma excentricidade, para um hotel de 5 estrelas, mas está bem! 
Podia ter opção das almofadas, ser uma mais macia e outra mais rija, como são todas iguais não dá para escolher. Fica a dica ;)

likedText: Hotel molto bello ristrutturato da poco e molto tecnologico. Posizione centralissima e in pochi min a piedi si raggiunge tutto. Letto nn grandissimo ma standard, colazione buona e con una parte anche alla carta, lo yogurt sublime.

likedText:
The only good thing to point out is its location. Walking you can reach the most interesting places in the center of Athens.
--------------
Lo único bueno destacable es su localización. Caminando puedes llegar a los lugares más interesantes del centro de Atenas.
reviewTitle: Hotel cutre. No es un 5 estrellas. Crappy hotel; not a 5 star.
dislikedText:
It is not a 5 star hotel. It is at most a 4 star hotel that is very well located.
There is no space for a taxi to drop you off and no porter service... so when you arrive from the airport you have to drag your luggage all the way to the reception.
Mind this is a "smart" hotel though you have personal contact with the reception and they are quite unfriendly. The rooms are sparsely furnished, minimalist and rudimentary for a 5 star hotel. Do not expect luxury.
The breakfast is quite on average. 
Remember that their check-out time is 11:00 a.m. (according to the receptionist this is "business as usual" in smart hotels).
Look for other alternatives. You have much better hotels options in Athens for similar price.
--------------
No es un hotel de 5 estrellas. Se trata de un hotel de como mucho 4 estrellas que está muy bien situado.
No disponen de espacio para que un taxi te deje y tampoco de servicio de maletero… así que cuando llegas del aerepuerto te toca arrastrarte con todo el equipaje hasta llegar a la recepción.
Como es un hotel “inteligente” el "único" contacto personal lo tienes con la recepción y son bastante poco amables. Las habitaciones disponen de un mobiliario escaso, minimalista y rudimentario para ser un hotel de 5 estrellas. No esperes lujo.
El desayuno es bastate normalito.
Recuerda que su horario de salida es las 11:00 a.m. (según la recepcionista es "lo normal" en los hoteles inteligentes)
Busca otras alternativas porque en Atenas por el mismo precio dispones de hoteles mucho mucho mejor.
propertyResponse:
Dear Belen , 
First and foremost we would like to thank you for choosing our Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel for your holidays for your valuable and constructive feedback. It is very important for us, and we take under great consideration your remarks. Kindly inform you that our hotel has a pick up and drop off space so our guests don’t need to crawl the luggage’s. As for the reception team it’s the first time we receive such a comment, we are always trying to offer friendly and professional service in order our guest to feel like home. Regarding check-out time is well written in the rules as well as your reservation. When you came at the reception my colleague informed you about the checkout time, nevertheless and for your satisfaction we managed to give you late check out. Regarding the rooms all our newly refurbished accommodations designed to make our guests stay as comfortable as possible with design furniture and the latest technology, being fully aware that an attractive accommodation plays a key role to our  guests overall holiday experience. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

likedText: La localisation centrale à 15/20 minutes a pied de tous les lieux incontournables ! Le petit déjeuner buffet de très bonne qualité et varié même sur 4 jours. Jus d’orange frais ! dislikedText: On ne devrait pas changer les essuies tous les jours. Ce n’est pas très eco responsable ! Manque une armoire de rangement des vêtements. Nous n’avons pas trouvé le système électronique d’éclairage et de climatisation, assez décrié dans les commentaires, trop compliqué.

likedText:
La struttura meravigliosa, a due passi da Piazza Monastiraki e dalla fermata della metro.
Lo staff molto cordiale, ci hanno sempre accolti con tanta disponibilità. Al nostro arrivo ci hanno fatto  trovare in stanza persino dei dolcetti e un liquore di benvenuto, un gesto molto carino e apprezzato.
La stanza bellissima, grazie alla tecnologia con l'app era possibile gestire diverse funzionalità tra cui le luci e la pulizia della stanza; inoltre, malgrado la sua posizione nel centro di Atene, era completamente insonorizzata e si dormiva meravigliosamente. . 
La colazione era fantastica, lo yogurt greco mi è rimasto nel cuore; peraltro nei due giorni in cui dovevamo uscire presto ci hanno preparato un sacchetto per la colazione, una vera carineria. 
Lo consiglio assolutamente,  sia per comfort che per lo staff, professionale e gentilissimo.
propertyResponse:
Dear Daniela,
Words are not enough to thank you for your outstanding review. Your feedback will serve as an encouragement to all our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services. Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be as pleasant as the previous one. Best Regards, Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel Team

likedText:
Am fost foarte incantata de alegerea acestui hotel. Este pozitionat foarte central, aproape de toate obiectivele turistice (am vizitat absolut tot doar mergand pe jos, maxim 10-15 minute de mers pe jos fata de obiectivele turistice).
Camera moderna, mobilier nou, absolut totul putea fi comandat din aplicatia instalata pe telefon: deschidere usa camera, iluminatul din camera, draperiile. Am avut camera 402 care avea o terasa foarte foarte draguta. Patul extrem de confortabil, micul dejun, cu toate ca nu era foarte diversificat a fost de buna calitate, cafea foarte buna (inclusiv cea pe care am facut-o la expresorul din camera).
La 1 minut de mers pe jos erau stradute cu terase si restaurante, foarte animate stradutele pana seara la 11-12 noaptea.
Nu avem nimic de reprosat, doar cuvinte de lauda.

Always a your disposal,
Best Regards, Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel Team

likedText: Ein sehr männliches Hotel. Viel Technik, alles per App steuerbar. Sehr unpersönlich. Das Zimmer war sauber. Alles andere im Hotel eher nicht. Die Gänge wie auf einem Schiff: lange , kahle Koridore, die fast bedrohlich wirkten. Super freundliches Restaurant Personal. Unser Begrüßungsgetränk und Snack aufm Zimmer wurde allerdings weggeräumt, bevor wir es probieren konnten. Wir haben ein Zimmer mit Sicht auf die Akropolis gebucht - das war leider auch nix. Super Lage. Sehr zentral und nahe an der Metrostation. Mit geschlossenen Fenster konnte man die pulsierende Stadt auch kaum hören. Sehr bequeme Betten. Super "Erlebnisdusche".
dislikedText:
Die Beleuchtung: Das Licht im gesamten Hotel, vor allem im Zimmer und Restaurant ist so hell und "dicht" wie auf den Flughäfen - verursacht Kopfschmerzen. 
Alles wirkt sehr unpersönlich und nüchtern.
propertyResponse: Dear Michael, we would like to thank you for your preference in our hotel during your recent visit in Athens, your rating and kind comments. We value the opinion of our guests about their experience during their stay, so we are very thankful for sharing it. Please, accept our apologies for any inconvenience caused during your stay but, we wish if we had the opportunity to be informed about any issues that you mention here, because our teams would be able to resolve them with immediate action and make you satisfied as every single one of our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back! Warm regards, Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel Team

Es un hotel catalogado como 5 estrellas, cosa que no es, pues no tiene los servicios de un hotel de estas características. El espacio de la cama a la pared era mínimo, en realidad el tema de la domótica no es lo que realmente hace que un hotel sea confortable.
Se escucha todo de las otras habitaciones. 
Si bien es cierto está cerca de todos los sitios de interes.
El desayuno muy básico y sin variedad.

likedText: Die Lage war wirklich sehr gut; sehr zentral gelegen. Nur wenige Gehminuten bis zur Metro. Restaurants und Bars in Hülle und Fülle direkt in der Straße. Das Frühstück war sehr ansprechend und abwechslungsreich. Frisch gepresster Orangensaft und englisches Frühstück; sehr lecker.

L’hôtel est très joli, la chambre spacieuse, avec des équipements exceptionnels, notamment la douche. On peut également commander les lumières et les stores depuis son propre téléphone.
L’hôtel est très bien situé en plein centre d’Athènes. Si vous venez en voiture, un espace devant est prévu pour déposer les bagages.
Nous avons quitté l’hôtel très tôt le matin et un petit déjeuner à emporter nous attendait.
reviewTitle: Très bel hôtel avec des équipements exceptionnels
dislikedText: Malgré une très épaisse porte d’entrée de la chambre, on entend le couloir et même les voisins qui se douchent et se sèchent les cheveux

likedText: Emplacement géographique parfait
reviewTitle: Bien situé mais un peu 'froid' au niveau infrastructure salle petit déj.
dislikedText: Petit déjeuner un peu 'industriel'... salle pas accueillante et bruyante. C'est la même salle qui est utilisée pour resto et bar... où il n'y a pas un chat. Trop de technologies dans la chambre. Air co ne fonctionnait pas toujours. Problème technique

likedText: La chambre 306 est parfaite. Le personnel est hyper attentif, l’hôtel calme malgré sa situation très centrale.
dislikedText: La salle du petit déjeuner devrait être insonorisée et l’air conditionné était très froid.

likedText: De locatie, de kamer en het ontbijt
dislikedText: De checkout, geen interesse en intussen aan de telefoon, niet gevraagd hoe het was

likedText: Было все замечательно. Расположение отеля просто супер,  все в пешей доступности, метро в 3 минутах ходьбы, вокруг очень много ресторанов на любой вкус, все туристические улицы расположены в нескольких минутах ходьбы   Сам отель новый с отличным дизайном. Особо хочется отметить персонал отеля ( рецепшн, ресторан уборка) всегда доброжелательны, с улыбкой и желанием помочь. У нас был ранний выезд и нам они сами предложили приготовить пакет с завтраком , соком, водой, фруктами и снейками в дорогу. Все просто было выше всяких похвал. Забыла отметить, что у моего мужа был юбилей и нас в номере ждали  бутылка вина и тортик со свечками.было очень приятно
dislikedText: Все понравилось. Единственное, что было бы неплохо, так это  каждый день обновлять бутылку питьевой воды. Но это незначительное неудобство

likedText: Hotel bien ubicado , a un paso de todo, moderno, con buen desayuno. personal muy atento y predispuesto a la ayuda.
La ubicación y la colaboración de los trabajadores en ayudarte en todo lo que pueden.

likedText:
Lage: Das Hotel liegt in einer Seitenstrasse zwischen Emou-Str (Restaurant, Geschäfte) und Monasirak (Metro)i. In der Parallel-Str hinter Emou-Str gibt es verschiedene Supermärkte. In der Stadt kommt man überall gut zu Fuss hin. 
Frühstück: Das Personal beim Frühstück war toll. Das Buffet beim Frühstück war vom Platz her klein aber es gab viel Auswahl und jeden Tag auch etwas neues/anderes. Sehr lecker. Der Frühstücksraum ist einfach gehalten, Farb-Akzente wie beim Eingang wären gut.
Zimmer: Wir hatten die Suite mit Wirlpool. Die war gross, das Bad auch und es gab eine Terasse.
Smart: Für uns eine neue Erfahrung: eine Toilette, die von alleine den Deckel öffnet und schliesst. Licht, AC und Vorhänge mit Smartphone steuern war cool. Gelegentlich blieb aber die App oder der Server hängen. Am Empfang gibts aber auch ein Ersatzzimmerkarte, falls man ohne raus ist.
reviewTitle: schöne Städtereise mit Wellness im Hotelzimmer
dislikedText: Die AirCondition der Nachbargebäude hat man gelegentlich gehört. Da kann aber das Hotel nichts dafür. Vermutlich ist das überall so in Athen. Die App-Steuerung ist mehrfach abgestürzt. Aber es gibt eine manuelle Kontrolle. Man sitzt nicht im Dunkeln.

likedText: מלון בוטיק חדש נקי במיקום מרכזי דקה המרחוב ארמו המרכזי אבל שקט מאוד. החדר שהיינו סופריור בקומה 2 היה דיי קטן אבל מעוצב יפה וחדש. המיטה נוחה בטירוף. המקלחת כיפית. יש את כל האביזרים שצריך לחופשה מושלמת. הצוות היה מקסים. ארוחת הבוקר היתה בסדר- חביתה לבחירה, קפה לבחירה ובופה קטן ונחמד. בקיצור מומלץ מאוד!!

likedText:
A 1 minuto da piazza Monastiraki, nel pieno centro della movida greca.
Hotel completamente smart. Si gestisce tutto tramite un'app da cui si apre la porta della camera, si accendono le luci, si comandano le tende. Personale davvero gentile e disponibile. Camera pulita, con macchinetta Nespresso, frigo bar e cassaforte. Ottimo il set da bagno che comprende in po' tutto ciò che serve.
Colazione varia, sia dolce che salato, con un buon yogurt.
dislikedText: Le tende della finestra non si chiudono perfettamente e la luce passa, quindi la mattina è un po' problematico. Il letto è nuovo ma non l'ho trovato comodissimo. Spegnere le luci dai pulsanti è più complicato che dall'app

likedText:
כל ההמלצות פה מדוייקות ונכונות! זו הבחירה המנצחת והטובה ביותר לשהות באתונה ואחת ההצלחות הגדולות ביותר שלנו עם בוקינג. 
מיקום המלון- מנצח! צעדים ספורים מהלוקומאטס המפורסם על רח' ארמו למי שמכיר, בלב העניינים. כל אזורי הבילוי במרחק עד 5 דק' בהגזמה, אתרים ארכיאולגיים עד 15 דק הליכה.  בצנטרום של הצנטרום ועדיין מלון שקט והחלונות אטומים מעולה כך שלא שומעים כלום מבחוץ.
צוות המלון נדיר. כולם אדיבים, חייכנים, מקצועיים מאוד, אנגלית שוטפת. עזרו וצ'יפרו איפה שרק אפשר. רואים שהמלון וההצלחה שלו חשובים להם מאוד וכולם עובדים בצוות ובמקצועיות ולבביות כדי שהאירוח יהיה לא פחות ממושלם.
Many thanks to the amazing Evina from the dinning room, whose warm smile and hospitality really made us feel welcomed and at home, from me and my sister ❤
חדרי המלון חדשים ומפנקים, מוצרי טואלטיקה משובחים.
ארוחת בוקר באיכות נדירה ומעולה, מנות ביצים בהכנה אישית, מאפים יווניים אותנטיים משובחים, סוטלאז' מעלף, מיצים טבעיים.

הליכה 3 דק' מתחנת רכבת מונסטירקי, רכבת ישירה לשדה התעופה במחיר 11 יורו. 

לגבי מלון חכם והאפליקציה- לא להילחץ מחלק מהתגובות. הכל פשוט ונוח ואפשר גם בלי אפליקציה בכלל.
dislikedText: אמנם אין נוף מהחדרים הנמוכים אבל זה לא מפריע ולא גורע כהוא זה מאיכות המלון. נחזור בוודאות וממליצים לכולם.

Obsługa była bardzo uprzejma i pomocna. Śniadanie smaczne, nie bardzo różnorodne, ale całkowicie wystarczające.

reviewTitle: מלון בוטיק ממש חמוד עם VFM מעולה.
dislikedText:
הייתי שמח לחביתה (או משהו בסגנון) בארוחת הבוקר, הבידוד בין החדרים לא להיט (שמענו כל פעם שפתחו מים בחדרים שליד...), הגימורים רחוקים מלהיות אלו של מלון חמישה כוכבים (ידית כניסה עקומה, רטיבות קלה, שקעים לא מכוסים וכד' - לא דרמטי, בכלל לא דרמטי, אבל זה לא חמישה כוכבים).
הקטע שאין ארונות סגורים לא הפריע לנו, אבל אני מתאר לעצמי שזה משהו שיפריע ללא מעט אנשים ולכן מציין את זה.

likedText: מיקום המלון מצוין, ממש במרכז, במרחק הליכה לכל מקום. לקחנו סוויטת קווין עם אמבט ספא, לכבוד יום הולדת, החדר היה מפנק ונוח, הצוות היה מדהים, קיבלנו יין מבעבע כרטיס ברכה פלטת פירות ועוגה. היה ממש מפנק וכיף. כולם מאד אדיבים שירותים נימוסים וחייכנים. ארוחת הבוקר הייתה מגוונת והציעו תפריט נוסף בחינם להזמנת מנות מיוחדות בארוחת בוקר
reviewTitle: מיקום מצוין, שירות יוצא מן הכלל!
dislikedText: ביום השני הייתה תקלה ולא היו מים חמים ל24 שעות. כמובן שהתאכזבנו מאד , אבל המלון העניק לנו זיכוי של 20% משווי החדר, ארוחת ערב חינם וצ׳ק אין מאוחר בשעה 15:00. הם באמת יצאו מגדרם בשביל לפצות אותנו על אי הנעימות וזה הורגש מאד בשירות מצוין ללא דופי.

propertyResponse:
Dear Aviv, 
thank you for your highest rating and polite remarks regarding your recent stay in our hotel.
We would like to express our apologies for any inconvenience caused during your stay. Though. we would like to inform you, as it might be found misleading for other guests that you booked an Accessible Room, which is normally booked by guests with reduced mobility. For that reason, it is built following safety measures and is not covered ( modified bathroom).Within an hour of your check in  you contacted our Front Office and we provide you an option of another type of room at a minimum extra cost of 15 EUR, to respect the cost and be fair, something that we mutually agreed. Rest assured that your remarks are well noted and immediate actions were followed.

We hope to welcome you again on another occasion in the near future!

Always at your disposal,
Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel Team

τοποθεσία , ευγένεια προσωπικού , πολύ καλό πρωινό , πεντακάθαρο

Sia io che mia moglie abbiamo trovato questo albergo perfetto! La posizione è fantastica. Praticamente, quasi tutte le attrazioni principali sono a pochi minuti di strada a piedi e comunque, per i più pigri, c'è la stazione della metropolitana a circa 200 metri. Il personale è stato gentile, accogliente e attento alle nostre esigenze. La parola "SMART" nel nome dell'albergo corrisponde a verità. La camera è dotata di tutte quelle funzioni intelligenti che rendono il soggiorno più pratico e comodo (scaricando l'applicazione sul cellulare è possibile gestire ogni cosa legata alla camera: dalle luci al climatizzatore, dalle tende al comunicare il momento per le pulizie). La pulizia della camera e in generale di tutti gli spazi dell'albergo è ottima. Avevamo la colazione compresa che è sempre stata ricca di ogni cosa dal dolce al salato. Non abbiamo provato il ristorante interno ma, per chi, dopo una giornata in giro, non volesse tornare fuori, c'è anche questa possibilità.
dislikedText: Sostanzialmente direi che non c'è stato nulla che non ci è piaciuto. Per noi che siamo venuti ad Atene per visitarla e stare praticamente quasi sempre in giro è stato tutto perfetto.

likedText: la posizione , metro, locali , e le attrazioni vicine
reviewTitle: posto perfetto e lo staff disponibile, preparato è simpatico

כולם מאוד חיכניים ורוצים לעזור.
החדר נהדר, נקי, עיצוב, שליטה בתאורה, מיזוג וילונות דרך אפליקצייה
צוות הקבלה במיוחד ממש מקסימים ותמיד מנסים לעזור, ממש הפתיעו אותנו לטובה.
גם צוות חדר האוכל היו מקסימים.
בלי שביקשנו,
שדרגו את החדר,
הגענו מוקדם בבוקר, הרבה לפני זמן הצ'ק אין, עייפים מהטיסה,
מיד הציעו ארוחת בוקר ללא חיוב נוסף.
dislikedText:
ארוחת הבוקר,
פחות מתאימה לחיך הישראלי.
חסר מגוון ירקות וגבינות.

likedText: המיקום מרכזי מאוד, מרחק הליכה מכל מקום באתונה. חדר נקי וחדש. חדר חכם ניתן לשלוט דרך אפליקציה.
dislikedText:
overly smart room
יותר מידי חכם. הקונספט של המלון שחדריו חכמים. ניתן לשלוט בחדר דרך אפליקציה שזה מגניב מאוד.
קרו מספר דברים קצת מעצבנים שקשורים לטכנולוגיה החכמה של החדר: 
כשקיבלנו את החדר המזגן לא קירר והיה צורך לעשות איתחול מהמחשב של המלון (לקח שעתיים וחצי, באסה רצינית כשחם מאוד בחדר). 

למחרת הכרטיס לחדר לא עבד כלל ולא הצליחו לסדר זאת עד סוף השהייה, אך היה ניתן לפתוח דרך האפליקציה של הטלפון (די הייתי תלוי לקחת את הטלפון איתי גם לארוחת בוקר וכששכחתי לקחת הייתי צריך לבקש מפתח פיזי מהקבלה)

ביום האחרון המים במקלחת היו פושרים וגם פה היו צריכים לאתחל את המחשוב של הבויילר וגם זה לקח כמה שעות.
מספר בעיות טכניות שקשורות לאיתחול המערכת הממוחשבת והחכמה.

יותר מידי חכם, יותר מידי מעצבן.

ביום השני עשינו צ'קאאוט די מוקדם, כך שלא הספקנו לאכול. בקשנו מראש שיארזו לנו, ונענינו בחיוב. אבל.. האכזבה הייתה רבה. ארזו לנו מעין סנדוויץ' עלוב, 2 בננות וזהו. ללא ספק, היינו מעדיפים לקבל החזר כספי על ארוחת הבוקר )שנאלצנו לשלם מראש( ולא את הטייק אווי שקבלנו.

מה שהכי הפריע לנו שהחדר היה מאוד בסיסי עם נוף ל.. עמודים ישנים ומתקלפים. לא מרפסת, לא נוף לאקרופוליס. שום כלום.

כמו כן, אין בחדר ארון )ידענו מראש( וגם אין כ"כ מדפים. לא נוח.

likedText: מיקום מושלם. מלון בוטיק אינטימי ושקט במרכז אתונה, קרוב להכל. ארוחת בוקר טובה. הצוות מסביר פנים ומוכן לעזור בכל בקשה ושאלה

reviewTitle: Excesivamente caro para lo poco que ofrece
dislikedText:
No es un hotel de 5 estrellas ni de lejos.
La habitación y sobre todo el baño son muy pequeños.
Entraba muchísimo ruido de la calle y fue muy difícil dormir.
El desayuno es bastante mediocre.

likedText: Необычно управлять светом, кондиционером и входной дверью на смартфоне. Брал номер повышенной комфортности с видом на Акрополь, вид потрясающий. В номере всё есть: чайник, кофемашина, все принадлежности. Персонал очень хороший, уборка ежедневно с заменой полотенец, если их бросить на пол.

likedText:
Ganz neues Hotel in der Stadt und alles in tadellosem Zustand. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich, hilfsbereit und mehrerer Sprachen mächtig. (Besonders Herr Hans ;))
Das Frühstück vom Buffet als auch von der Karte super lecker, immer frisch und sehr schön zubereitet. Die Zimmer sind sehr sauber und sehr gut schallisoliert, sodass man weder vom Nachbarn, noch etwas von draußen mitbekommt. Somit schläft man sehr ruhig was den Erholungsfaktor extrem steigert. Die Lage ist optimal um alles wichtige fussläufig erreichen zu können. Ich werde bestimmt gerne wieder kommen.
Rewelacja, super personel, lokalizacja, cisza,standard

likedText: le confort et son emplacement
מלון בוטיק חדש, מתאים בעיקר לזוגות , צוות העובדים אדיב ושירותי, ממוקם באזור מרכזי ונוח.
καταπληκτικό design , σαν smart hotel όλα δούλευαν ρολόι!!
מיקום מעולה! צוות המלון מקסים ונכון לעזור בכל רגע ובכל דבר. החדר היה גדול ומרווח. ארוחת בוקר טובה מאוד ומספקת.

Die Lage ist perfekt, mittendrin und trotzdem ruhig, besser gehts nicht! Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hat sich immer umgehend um alle Wünsche gekümmert. Die Zimmer sind modern eingerichtet und sauber. Das Frühstück war wirklich sehr gut und lecker. Zwar scheint das Buffet auf den ersten Blick überschaubar, aber es gab von allem etwas und noch mehr und dazu konnte man sich leckere Pancakes oder Eierspezialitäten bestellen.
reviewTitle: Modernes, sauberes Hotel in bester Lage mit sehr aufmerksamen Personal und leckerem Frühstück.
dislikedText: Für die Kleidung hätte ich mir eine Ablagemöglichkeit, ein Regal oder eine Bank gewünscht, aber es gab ausreichend Bügel zum aufhängen, der Rest konnte im Koffer bleiben. Und mir persönlich wehte die Klimaanlage im Frühstücksraum zu stark. Aber was des einen Leid, ist des anderen Freud. Das sind aber nur Kleinigkeiten. Alles in allem war es top! Wir würden das Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel wieder buchen!

likedText: Eνα εξαιρετικό smart ξενοδοχείο, στο κέντρο της πόλης πολύ κοντά στο μετρό Μοναστηράκι! Νεόκτιστο ξενοδοχείο σε ένα υπέροχο κτίριο που αξίζει πραγματικά να το επισκεφτείς για να κάνεις την διαμονή σου ονειρική, ξεκούραστη και αναπαυτική! Το προσωπικό πολύ φιλικό και εξυπηρετικό - ήμουν βιαστικος για επαγγελματικό ραντεβου και μου έφεραν αμέσως σίδερο και σιδεροστρα στο δωμάτιο και ο κύριος στην ρεσεψιόν που μου διαφεύγει το όνομα, επειδή είχε κλείσει το κέντρο λόγο πορείας προσπάθησε να με εξυπηρετήσει καλώντας ταξί και τον ευχαριστώ πάρα πολύ-. Πολύ καλό και το πρωίνο, φιλικό σέρβις και θα πω και ένα μεγάλο μπράβο στο προσωπικό της κουζίνας για τα γευστικά πιάτα και τον μπουφέ! Το Προτείνω!!!

likedText:
+ Прекраснейший отель! Локация 5+! 5-15 мин пешком до всех достопримечательностей, баров и ресторанов. Все новое, чистое! Персонал прекрасный: в первый день плохо работал водосток в душе, сообщила на ресепшн с просьбой исправить: в результате мгновенно предоставили двухкомнатный полулюкс взамен стандартного номера!:) просто шикарно:) ещё принесли в подарок вино с закусками, прямо праздник какой-то)) от отеля осталось прекраснейшее впечатление! от души рекомендую!
+ Завтраки вкусные, но не общий шведский стол, а индивидуальный: приносят набор хлеба/булочек, сыра, ветчины, орешков/сухофруктов, спредов и джемов + из меню выбираешь горячую часть завтрака (омлеты/яичницы)
+ Без каких-либо проблем и доплат оформили поздний чекаут в 14.00, отель старается, молодцы!

reviewTitle: 4 días y 4 noches en pareja para un viaje relámpago con mi esposa de aniversario.
dislikedText:
No se me informó al check in del pago de un impuesto al check out (incluso se me dijo que ya estaba todo liquidado y es lo que indica booking). Pedí apoyo para dejar en el correo unas cartas postales que 1 mes después no han llegado (la duda si las depositaron o si es responsabilidad del servicio postal aunque fue buena disponibilidad del personal). Mi cuarto era algo oscuro en el día, no hay oscuridad total en la noche. Un día al regresar a la habitación, ésta estaba abierta (aunque no me faltaba nada), lo señalé a recepción al parecer un olvido del personal de servicio. 
Al check out al dejar maletas en consigna estas nunca fueron resguardadas en un cuarto cerrado.

likedText:
+ очень дружелюбный и внимательный персонал
+ нас заселили раньше, чем должны были по правилам отеля
+ без нашей просьбы отель повысил нам класс номера, и дал номер лучше и с видом на Акрополь
+ в номере нас ждал комплимент от отеля, это было приятно
+ в номере очень просторный и комфортный санузел
+ удобно, что в номере капсульная кофеварка и чайник (капсулы пополняли каждый день)
+ в ресторане во время завтрака прекрасное обслуживание, первый раз встречаю такой сервис именно на завтраке
+ сам завтрак тоже очень качественный
+ отель смарт: всё управляется через приложение, но этот плюс для меня не так важен, т.к. не вижу проблемы включить свет нажатием кнопки или открыть дверь картой))) Человеческое отношение - на первом месте. А оно в этом отеле на высшем уровне.
reviewTitle: Хочется пожелать удачи и поблагодарить за прекрасное время в вашем отеле. Всё отлично. Из предложений в голову приходят
dislikedText: - несколько неудобно было, что возле кровати (по обеим сторонам) не оказалось банальных розеток или хотя бы USB-C, чтобы заряжать телефоны, планшеты… Есть просто USB. Но в самом номере розеток достаточно.
